titles.title: A bill to amend the Farm Security and Rural Investment Act of 2002 to increase the loan rate for safflower.
A bill to amend the Farm Security and Rural Investment Act of 2002 to increase the loan rate for safflower.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

bill.summary: Amends the Farm Security and Rural Investment Act of 2002 to increase the nonrecourse marketing loan rate for safflower. (Separates safflower from "other oilseeds.")
